name: Ad-Lib.io
description: Ad-Lib helps tailor creative to users online.

jobs.title: Chief Eng Officer
jobs.description:
Chief Eng Officer
Build and Lead an Eng team
Learn from current partner based in Germany
Partnerships with both Google and Facebook
Development and management of applications and APIs
Design and implementation of scalable applications
Implementation of automated tests
Release Management
Very good practical Python knowledge
Experience with Tornado/Twisted/gevent or similar concurrency frameworks
At least 3 years of professional experience
Methodical approach and excellent problem solving skills
Experience with several SQL/NoSQL data stores and data bases
Solid Unix knowledge (filesystem, sockets, memory, TCP/IP)
Solid English
Huge plus: C/C++ and ZeroMQ experience

Chief Eng Officer
Build and Lead an Eng team
Learn from current partner based in Germany
Partnerships with both Google and Facebook

At least 3 years of professional experience

Experience with several SQL/NoSQL data stores and data bases
Solid Unix knowledge (filesystem, sockets, memory, TCP/IP)
Solid English
Huge plus: C/C++ and ZeroMQ experience
